channel.title: Posts on LTU产学合作成果网
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on LTU产学合作成果网

item.title: 利用R語言-劃興富發股價k線及技術指標
item.description: 第1步：R工作目錄指令 getwd() ## [1] "C:/Users/ThinkPad/Documents/ltu/content/post" 第2步：R使用quantmod套件指令 ## 载入需要的程辑包：xts ## 载入需要的程辑包：zoo ## ## 载入程辑包：'zoo' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## as.Date, as.Date.numeric ## 载入需要的程辑包：TTR ## Version 0.4-0 included new data defaults. See ?getSymbols. 第3步：R網路抓取Yahoo中興富發股價資料 stock <- getSymbols("2542.TW", auto.assign = FALSE) ## 'getSymbols' currently uses auto.assign=TRUE by default, but will ## use auto.assign=FALSE in 0.5-0. You will still be able to use ## 'loadSymbols' to automatically load data.

item.title: 利用R語言-劃長虹股價k線及技術指標
item.description: 第1步：R工作目錄指令 getwd() ## [1] "C:/Users/ThinkPad/Documents/ltu/content/post" 第2步：R使用quantmod套件指令 ## 载入需要的程辑包：xts ## 载入需要的程辑包：zoo ## ## 载入程辑包：'zoo' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## as.Date, as.Date.numeric ## 载入需要的程辑包：TTR ## Version 0.4-0 included new data defaults. See ?getSymbols. 第3步：R網路抓取Yahoo中長虹股價資料 stock <- getSymbols("5534.TW", auto.assign = FALSE) ## 'getSymbols' currently uses auto.assign=TRUE by default, but will ## use auto.assign=FALSE in 0.5-0. You will still be able to use ## 'loadSymbols' to automatically load data.
